snippet: A consultant’s analysis of the New York City Housing Authority says the authority is not organized to spend federal dollars wisely or efficiently. It needs to be fixed as much as leaky plumbing does.
abstract: Editorial argues that the New York City Housing Authority, which has been extremely slow to make much-needed repairs in controlled and subsidized housing, will have to fix its management structure to ensure that the agency is better organized to spend federal dollars wisely and efficiently.
lead_paragraph: A consultant’s analysis of the New York City Housing Authority says the authority is not organized to spend federal dollars wisely or efficiently. It needs to be fixed as much as leaky plumbing does.

headline.seo: Repair New York City’s Housing Issues
headline.main: Repair New York City’s Housing Issues
headline.print_headline: Repair New York City’s Housing Issues
